column3: Latest;Pailin: A landlord called police after a bad smell was coming from a room rented to a Thai female.------ Chetak Kotchakorn
column5: was said to have quarreled with other Thais who came to the property and had a gambling problem. Police said she spent a lot of time in casinos and was probably in debt.------Her body was found 3-4 days after death
column6: according to ------the report------. Cause of death was given as suicide (*later confirmed as hanging).------Her body was being prepared to transport to relatives in Thailand.
